post_title: Preview, HOF graded T206 sale - pre Shriners
post_content:
Good morning all

I’m excited to be joining Paul Borges to share a table at the upcoming Shriners show here in the Boston area in a couple of weeks.

I thought I would preview some of the cards available here in case anyone would like a sneak peek. I have individual card images of any of these so feel free to inquire and I can send them to you.


Too many to post individually here, as you can see!  If anyone is in the local Massachusetts market and plans to go to Shriners, please come by and say hello!

PayPal for payment plus $10 to ship please

Jeff
